name: HL7 Version 2 Model Elements
title: HL7 Version 2 Model Elements
description:
This code system defines HL7 Version 2 Model Elements used for Version 2 to FHIR Translation
This subset addresses model elements used for conversion of V2-FHIR Mapping - Segment: OBR[ServiceRequest]
Source data can be found at https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=49644438

property.description: High value for cardinality, set to 2147483647 if unbounded
The V2 Datatype assigned to this model element

concept.code: Considering purpose of OBR-8, need to further refine boundaries of what is put into collectionPeriod
Clarify the choice depends on whether the specimen is collected first and then a service request is made OR service request is made and then the specimen is collected
concept.display: If OBR-11 = "P" then that can be used to determine whether to start with ServiceRequest or create a Specimen first.
